movies.title: Night Boats
movies.plot: Melodrama about love in an old people's home. Helena and Jakov thought their life was over until love struck them. And they take off from the bleak institution, like teenagers running from home. They take off into their romance - a romance they thought they would never experience again.
movies.simplePlot: Seventy-year-old teenagers running away from home. They are not running away from their parents, they are running away from the inevitable.

biography.bio: Ana Karic was born on May 13, 1941 in Perusic, Croatia, Yugoslavia as Ana Karic Tür. She was an actress, known for Night Boats (2012), The Scene of the Crash (1971) and Adventure at the Door (1961). She died on October 9, 2014 in Zagreb, Croatia.
biography.name: Ana Karic

biography.bio: Radko Polic was born on August 18, 1942 in Crnomelj, Slovenia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Idealist (1976), Night Boats (2012) and Balkan ekspres (1983). He is married to Barbara Levstik. He was previously married to Rozalija Hace and Milena Zupancic.
biography.name: Radko Polic

biography.bio: Renata Ulmanski was born on November 29, 1929 in Zagreb, Croatia, Yugoslavia. She is known for her work on Vaga za tacno merenje (1975), The Professional (2003) and Salas u Malom Ritu (1976).
biography.name: Renata Ulmanski

biography.bio: Lana Baric was born on December 11, 1979. She is an actress and writer, known for Stipe u gostima (2008), You Carry Me (2015) and Hush... (2013).
biography.name: Lana Baric

biography.bio: Bogdan Diklic was born on August 1, 1953 in Bjelovar, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for The Marathon Family (1982), No Man's Land (2001) and Au feu! (2003).
biography.name: Bogdan Diklic

biography.bio: Marija Geml was born on April 28, 1938 in Molin, Banat, Vojvodina, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for Night Boats (2012), Le fantôme de Tito (1999) and Kolinje (1970).
biography.name: Marija Geml

biography.bio: Mirna Medakovic was born on June 20, 1985 in Zagreb, Croatia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for Zabranjena ljubav (2004), Pod sretnom zvijezdom (2011) and Sve ce biti dobro (2008). She has been married to Hrvoje Stepinac since May 9, 2015.
biography.name: Mirna Medakovic

biography.bio: Zvonimir Torjanac was born on September 14, 1930 in Donji Miholjac, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He was an actor, known for Oficir s ruzom (1987), Pod starim krovovima (1984) and Night Boats (2012). He died on September 9, 2014 in Zagreb, Croatia.
biography.name: Zvonimir Torjanac

biography.bio: Jadranka Djokic was born on January 14, 1981 in Pula, Croatia, Yugoslavia. She is an actress, known for Nasa mala klinika (2004), Bonté divine (2013) and Behind the Glass (2008).
biography.name: Jadranka Djokic

biography.bio: Pero Kvrgic was born on March 4, 1927 in Srpske Moravice, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He is known for his work on Stilske vjezbe (2001), TV Teatar Ujakov San (1987) and Svecanost (1962).
biography.name: Pero Kvrgic

biography.bio: Angel Palasev was born on January 28, 1942 in Veles, Macedonia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for The Birch Tree (1967), Smogovci (1982) and Night Boats (2012).
biography.name: Angel Palasev

biography.bio: Stefanija Acimac is an actress, known for 100 Minutes of Glory (2004), Flower Square (2012) and Snivaj, zlato moje (2005).
biography.name: Stefanija Acimac

biography.bio: Krunoslav Belko was born in 1971 in Zagreb, Croatia. He is an actor, known for Nit zivota (2000), Iza sna (2014) and Red Dust (1999).
biography.name: Krunoslav Belko

biography.bio: Denis Brizic was born on May 24, 1961 in Rijeka, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Je li jasno prijatelju? (2000), Zg80 (2016) and The Sands of Time (1992).
biography.name: Denis Brizic

biography.bio: Alex Djakovic is an actor, known for Night Boats (2012) and La femme mousquetaire (2004).
biography.name: Alex Djakovic

categories.category: Best Actress in a Leading Role
